description:
At my company, we started using Angular in 2012. We made a lot of mistakes over the past 2 years. In this talk, I'll show what we did wrong, how we fixed it, and how you can avoid making the same mistakes we did.

Slides: http://slides.com/djsmith/how-we-made-a-mess-of-our-angular-app
title: How i made a mess of my Angular application
